parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear defrost electrical connector can cause a fire hazard, potentially leading to a vehicle fire, and can also result in the loss of rear defrost functionality, reducing visibility and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The rear defrost does not work
the connector is melted
the wires are damaged
the connector has caught on fire.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The voltage drop when applying brakes can cause the headlights and instrument lights to dim, reducing visibility and increasing the risk of accidents, especially at night or in low-light conditions.
symptoms: Headlights and instrument lights dim when applying brakes
lights brighten back up when releasing brakes.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden and unexpected shattering of the rear window glass can cause distraction, loss of visibility, and potential injury from sharp glass fragments, which can lead to accidents or other safety hazards.
symptoms: The rear window glass shatters or explodes without any apparent reason or obstruction while lowering the convertible top.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The corrosion of brake lines can cause brake fluid leaks, leading to a loss of brake pressure, which can result in a complete brake failure, increasing the risk of accidents and injuries.
symptoms: Sudden loss of brake pressure
brake pedal feels soft or spongy
brake fluid leaks
difficulty stopping the vehicle
vehicle pulls to one side while braking
rear wheels lock up
and the vehicle spins out of control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The improper bonding of the roof pillar attachments can cause structural integrity issues, potentially leading to roof collapse or detachment, which can result in serious injury or death.
symptoms: None reported
as the issue was discovered during a paint job inspection.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The delayed deployment of airbags can cause unnecessary injuries and damage, and may also raise concerns about the effectiveness of the airbag system in more severe accidents.
symptoms: Airbags deploy with a delay of several seconds after the accident
even at low speeds
causing unnecessary injuries and damage.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The deployment of airbags in minor accidents or at low speeds can cause unnecessary injuries and damage, and may also lead to a loss of confidence in the airbag system.
symptoms: Airbags deploy in minor accidents or at low speeds
causing unnecessary injuries and damage.
